Package com.rockhoppertech.music.scale

Scale classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Scale  
    ScaleComparator
    Compares two Scales for sorting.
    ScaleFactory
    Reads Scale definitions from an XML file (scaledefs.xml by default) and caches them.
    ScaleTrackBuilder
    Create a MIDITrack from a Scale.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnknownScaleException
